author: archyworldyscom
title: Bad weather ‚Äì Dodecanese / 112 was sounded in Rhodes and Psara ‚Äì Strong weather conditions expected
text:
At the center of the bad weather there is once again the Island of the Knights which is still measuring its wounds from the bad weather Bora
THE Dodecanese and above all the Rhodes and the Fish are facing another strong wave of severe weather according to the Urgent weather report issued by EMY.
In Rhodes 112 rang again by the Civil Protection and while the Isola dei Cavalieri is still feeling the wounds of the Bora bad weather.
According to 112, residents are invited to limit travel within municipal communities Ialyssou, Rhodes, Kallithea and Petaloudon.
The first severe storm occurred at 3am on Friday in the city of Rhodes and other areas of it northern triangle of the island fortunately without causing serious problems.
It should be noted that EMY provides continuity heavy rain and thunderstorms for the entire Dodecanese from today Friday (6/12) until and, at least, Sunday morning hours (8/12).
The 112 also played in Psara with the Civil Protection inviting residents to limit movements as heavy rain and thunderstorms are forecast for the next 24 hours.
